name: Night Errand
description:
Night Errand is a 2D Platformer inspired by the classics - but now with guns!  Make your way through the dark streets of the city to amass as many points as possible, as quickly as possible. All while avoiding the strange turtle men that want to stop you from doing yo thang

  • Blast your way through each level 
  • Blast your way through turtle men, they don’t have feelings anyway 
  • Open doors aggressively; fuck those doors! 
  • Collect buffs to increase your weapon dexterity 
  • Fuck responsibility, deflect your problems with a shield 
  • Do it all quickly so you don’t look silly in the morning 

Attributions:
